All rooms are carpeted and decorated with blue and red elements and come with a shower and a hairdryer. Moreover rooms feature a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV, a radio, Internet access, a safe as well as a minibar and an ironing set. Individually regulated air conditioning is a standard feature of all accommodation.

This hotel offers modern accommodation with a maritime interior. This air-conditioned hotel offers 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, a cloakroom and lift access to upper floors.
